items.sentence: Tom used to be your best friend, didn\'t he?
Tom was afraid he had hurt Mary\'s feelings.
I\'ve never eaten at this restaurant before.
I live in Boston now, but I\'m from Chicago.
Tom said he thought Mary wasn\'t having fun.
Tell Tom how you found out that he did that.
I\'m sure Tom will do much better next time.
You don\'t want Tom to think you\'re insane.
I think that what Tom told you is the truth.
I think we should ask Tom to do that for us.
I can understand French to a certain extent.
Tom\'s apartment could use a feminine touch.
You\'re not the easiest person to live with.
I plan to go to Boston next week to see Tom.
I plan to stay here for the rest of my life.
I need to find someone who can speak French.
Just a moment. There\'s someone at the door.
I didn\'t hear a word of what Tom just said.
Tom has three apple trees in his front yard.
Well, aren\'t you going to kiss Tom goodbye?
